name: tinymanswap
description: Tinyman DEX swap integration - perform token swaps on the Algorand blockchain
author: aPlane Shell Team

commands.name: tinymanswap
examples: tinymanswap 10 ALGO to usdc for alice
tinymanswap 100 usdc to ALGO for bob via router

functions.name: tinymanSwap
functions.description: Swap tokens using Tinyman AMM (automatically resolves asset IDs for current network)

params.name: amount
params.description: Amount of source asset to swap

functions.returns: {txids: string[], amount_in: number, amount_out_expected: number, price_impact: number, slippage: number}
